data.grn_title: Jin et al.(MOLECULAR BIOLOGY AND EVOLUTION, 2015) Curated Combined Network
data.comments: The authors collected data from literature and with text mining tools and manual curation. Data from: http://atrm.cbi.pku.edu.cn/

data.grn_title: Park et al.(The Plant Journal, 2015) CBF Regulon Low Temperature Network
data.comments: Topic:Investigating cold regulation of the CBF regulon. Methods include transgenic lines that constitutively overexpressed a truncated version of CBF2, quantitative real time PCR analysis, affymetrix GeneChip hybridization. Data From: Table S5. This GRN specifically represents COR genes regulated by first wave transcription factors

data.grn_title: Keurentjes et al. (Proc Nat Acad Sci, 2007) Flowering Time Network
data.comments: Flowering Time analysis with genome-wide expression variation analysis (combining eQTL mapping and regulator candidate gene selection) in an RIL population of Arabidopsis thaliana. Data From: manual annotation of Figure 2.
